Structs/Transaction.html#/s:16SudoVirtua.name: billedAmount

Structs/Transaction.html#/s:16SudoVirtua.name: description

Structs/Transaction.html#/s:16SudoVirtua.name: declineReason
Structs/Transaction.html#/s:16SudoVirtua.abstract: Associated reason for why the tranaction was declined (if applicable).

Structs/CreditCardFundingSourceInput.htm.name: securityCode
Structs/CreditCardFundingSourceInput.htm.abstract: Rwquired 3 or 4 digit security code from the back of the card.

Structs/CreditCardFundingSourceInput.htm.name: address
Structs/CreditCardFundingSourceInput.htm.abstract: Required street address field for the cardholders legal residence.

Structs/CreditCardFundingSourceInput.htm.name: unitNumber
Structs/CreditCardFundingSourceInput.htm.abstract: Optional unit number field for the cardholders legal residence.

Structs/CreditCardFundingSourceInput.htm.name: state
Structs/CreditCardFundingSourceInput.htm.abstract: Required state that the city resides in.

Structs/CreditCardFundingSourceInput.htm.name: postalCode

Structs/CreditCardFundingSourceInput.htm.name: country
Structs/CreditCardFundingSourceInput.htm.abstract: The ISO2 country code the address resides in.

Structs/ProvisionCardInput.html#/s:16Sud.abstract: identifier of the funding source to use to fund the provisioned virtual card.

Structs/ProvisionCardInput.html#/s:16Sud.name: billingAddress
Structs/ProvisionCardInput.html#/s:16Sud.abstract: Address used as the billing address of the card.

Structs/FundingSource.html#/s:16SudoVirt.name: last4

Structs/FundingSource.html#/s:16SudoVirt.name: network
Structs/FundingSource.html#/s:16SudoVirt.abstract: Payment Method network of the funding source.

Structs/Card/Expiry.html#/s:16SudoVirtua.abstract: Year specifier, in format YYYY. e.g. (2020 == Year 2020).

Structs/Card.html#/s:16SudoVirtualCards4.name: id
Structs/Card.html#/s:16SudoVirtualCards4.abstract: Identifier generated by the Virtual Cards Service.

Structs/CurrencyAmount.html.name: CurrencyAmount
Structs/CurrencyAmount.html.abstract: Representation of a Currency Amount object on the Virtual Cards Service.

Structs/TransactionDetailChargeAttribute.name: TransactionDetailChargeAttribute
Structs/TransactionDetailChargeAttribute.abstract: Transaction detail. Depending on transaction type will detail things like fees, real credit

Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsClient.html#/s.name: reset()
Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsClient.html#/s.abstract: Removes all keys associated with this client, resets any cached data, cleans up subscriptions, and purges any pending operations.

Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsClient.html#/s.name: createFundingSource(withCreditCardInput:authorizationDelegate:completion:)
Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsClient.html#/s.abstract: Creates a Funding Source using a Credit Card input.

Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsClient.html#/s.name: getProvisionalCardWithId(_:cachePolicy:completion:)
Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsClient.html#/s.abstract: Get a provisional card using the id parameter. If the card cannot be found, nil will be returned.

Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsClient.html#/s.name: getProvisionalCardsWithFilter(_:limit:nextToken:cachePolicy:completion:)
Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsClient.html#/s.abstract: Get a list of provisional cards. If no cards can be found, an empty list will be returned.

Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsClient.html#/s.name: getCardWithId(_:cachePolicy:completion:)
Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsClient.html#/s.abstract: Get a card using the id parameter. If the card cannot be found, nil will be returned.

Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsClient.html#/s.name: getCardsWithFilter(_:limit:nextToken:cachePolicy:completion:)
Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsClient.html#/s.abstract: Get a list of cards. If no cards can be found, an empty list will be returned.

Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsClient.html#/s.name: getFundingSourceWithId(_:cachePolicy:completion:)
Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsClient.html#/s.abstract: Get a funding source using the id parameter. If the funding source cannot be found, nil will be returned.

Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsClient.html#/s.name: getFundingSourcesWithLimit(_:nextToken:cachePolicy:completion:)
Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsClient.html#/s.abstract: Get a list of funding sources. If no funding sources can be found, an empty list will be returned.

Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsClient.html#/s.name: getTransactionWithId(_:cachePolicy:completion:)
Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsClient.html#/s.abstract: Get a transaction using the id parameter. If the transaction cannot be found, nil will be returned.

Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsClient.html#/s.name: getTransactionsWithFilter(_:limit:nextToken:cachePolicy:completion:)
Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsClient.html#/s.abstract: Get a list of transactions. If no transactions can be found, an empty list will be returned.

Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsClient.html#/s.name: subscribeToTransactionUpdates(statusChangeHandler:resultHandler:)
Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsClient.html#/s.abstract: Subscribe to transaction update events. This includes creation of new transactions.

Protocols/FundingSourceAuthorizationDele.name: returnURL
Protocols/FundingSourceAuthorizationDele.abstract: Optional return URL to provide to any supported web hooks so they can automatically handle UI flows via openURL etc.

Protocols/FundingSourceAuthorizationDele.name: fundingSourceAuthorizationPresentingViewController()
Protocols/FundingSourceAuthorizationDele.abstract: Will return the view controller to present any additional authorization requests from.

Protocols/FundingSourceAuthorizationDele.name: FundingSourceAuthorizationDelegate
Protocols/FundingSourceAuthorizationDele.abstract: Delegate class used in provisioning funding source.

Protocols/ProvisionCardObservable.html.name: ProvisionCardObservable
Protocols/ProvisionCardObservable.html.abstract: Observable to define behavior for Provision Card API events.

Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsClient.html.name: SudoVirtualCardsClient
Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsClient.html.abstract: Client used to interface with the Sudo Payment Platform service.
